sentences.en: A Greyhound this is airconditioned, too. And it has reclining seats.
sentences.cn: 灰狗巴士也有空调设备, 并且有卧椅.

sentences.en: He gaged a costly ring upon the speed of his greyhound.
sentences.cn: 他押上一只昂贵的戒指以示他猎犬的速度.

sentences.en: I didn't fly. I took the Greyhound.
sentences.cn: 我没有乘飞机。我乘的是灰狗巴士。

sentences.en: In Norman England, the greyhound was a symbol of nobility.
sentences.cn: 灵犭是在诺曼时期的英格兰是高贵的象征。

sentences.en: In the early 1900 s, huge crowds would gather to watch greyhound coursing.
sentences.cn: 在20世纪初期, 看灰狗赛跑的人越来越多.

sentences.en: Last week, a small uncle to have a small Greyhound.
sentences.cn: 上个星期, 小姑父抱来一只小灰狗.

sentences.en: M 8 Greyhound no longer does incremental engine damage to vehicles.
sentences.cn: M8灰狗不在对装甲车造成叠加性的引擎损害.

sentences.en: Talbot, Mastiff and Greyhound - Courage, vigilancy and loyal fidelity.
sentences.cn: 塔尔博特犬 、 马士提夫獒犬、灵(犭是)-勇气 、 警惕以及对信念的忠诚.

sentences.en: The Chinese remembers the store that is connected to the Greyhound terminal.
sentences.cn: 中国人想起来那个跟灰狗车站相连的甜麦圈店.

sentences.en: The Greyhound Bus Origin Museum is located in Hibbing Minnesota.
sentences.cn: 灰狗汽车公司原址博物馆座落在明尼苏达的希宾镇.

sentences.en: They suggested Greyhound and explained to me the reason.
sentences.cn: 他们建议灰狗并且解释了原因.

sentences.en: Those who cannot afford either train or plane take the Greyhound bus.
sentences.cn: 那些乘不起火车和飞机的人可以乘快速汽车.

sentences.en: Where do I get a Greyhound ticket?
You can buy it when you go to the Greyhound station.
sentences.cn: 您可以乘车时到“灰狗”车站去买.

sentences.en: You can find Greyhound almost in every city, big or small.
sentences.cn: 他们也可以通过车窗看见城市和乡镇, 但是很少乘客每天都在乘火车.

sentences.en: You may go to the Greyhound Website and get one online.
sentences.cn: 您可以上灰狗的网站,在线购买一张.

trans.tran_en: In the United States, a Greyhound or a Greyhound bus is a bus that travels between towns or cities rather than within a particular town or city
